info.summary:
Brandon Bennett works as a Lecturer in Institute for Artificial Intelligence and Biological Systems  School of Computing  University of Leeds  Leeds, and his\her h-index is 15, g-index is 38. His\Her interests are :
 Ontology; Spatial Reasoning; Formal Ontology; Computer Vision; Cardinal Direction;
